metadata.title: CVE-2024-36138 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Bypass incomplete fix of CVE-2024-27980, that arises from improper handlingof batch files with all possible extensions on Windows viachild_process.spawn / child_process.spawnSync. A malicious command lineargument can inject arbitrary commands and achieve code execution even ifthe shell option is not enabled.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
